name: Dr. Ultraplex
description:
Dr. Stephan Plex, world famous scientist, sacrificed his life in order to create ultimate cure for any disease - ultraplex. These pills contain fragments of his own mind and when taken, gain consciousness and strive to achieve his utmost dream of curing the mankind.

CONTROLS:

move around with WASD, shoot with arrow keys or numpad. Select weapons with keys 1, 2 and 3.
